CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 22, 1961, pg. A27, reads: "CONSTABLE AND STARS - Constable Tommy Smith (third from left) is shown with three members of the team which performs as the Tommy Smiths, in Ammon Slow Pitch Softball League. From left to right: Centerfielder Capt. Jackie Younger; Tom Watkins, catcher; Constable Smith and Harry Holt, shortstop.  Their bating and fielding have played no small part in the team's recent success. Only moderately successful while the Constable was busy with recent primaries, the Smiths have been on a winning spree since their sponsor began backing them full-time. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Tommy Smith softball team members from left: centerfielder Captain Jackie Younger, catcher Tom Watkins, Thomas J. "Tommy" Smith in suit, and shortstop Harry Holt, joining hands on Ammon playing field
